sample_detection.cli module

sample_detection.detect module

class sample_detection.detect.SampleDetector(hop_length: int = 5, model: Optional[Model] = None)

Bases: object

find_samples(audio_1: Audio, audio_2: Audio, threshold: float) → List[Dict[str, float]]

Given two songs, find instances where one song contains a sample of the other.

Parameters

  • audio_1 (Audio) – Song 1

  • audio_1 – Song 2

  • threshold – Threshold above which to return samples.

Returns

List of dictionaries. Each dictionary contains the start time of the sample

in each song, the length of the sample, and the confidence score generated by the model for the sample.

sample_detection.load module

sample_detection.load.load_sample_info(sample_info_path: Union[str, Path]) → DataFrame

Load sample info from csv, with sample times as lists (as expected by other functions in this library).

Parameters

sample_info_path (str) – Path to sample info

Returns

Sample info (as scraped from scraper), with sample times as lists

Return type

pd.DataFrame
